## Functions

### findWLS() {#ac80c82ab5623016f11bc128c6a943af6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static MachineInstr &#42; findWLS (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineloop">MachineLoop</a> &#42; ML)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Find WhileLoopStart in the loop predecessor BB or otherwise in its only predecessor.

If found, returns (BB, WLS Instr) pair, otherwise a null pair.

Definition at line <a href="#l00076">76</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armblockplacement-cpp">ARMBlockPlacement.cpp</a>.

<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Checks if loop has a backwards branching WLS, and if possible, fixes it.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This requires checking the predecessor (ie. preheader or it&#39;s predecessor)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for a WLS and if its loopExit/target is before it.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If moving the predecessor won&#39;t convert a WLS (to the predecessor) from</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a forward to a backward branching WLS, then move the predecessor block</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to before the loopExit/target.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armblockplacement/#ab273671903c0baabbbf098a0a4581101"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armblockplacement/#ab273671903c0baabbbf098a0a4581101">ARMBlockPlacement::fixBackwardsWLS</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineloop">MachineLoop</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3ad01fd9b01e9dde8bd3dc247afbfb7218">ML</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!WlsInstr)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; <a href="#a1c9d15f8ccd4a52a7f0bf4f24db139bd">DEBUG&#95;PREFIX</a> &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Found a backwards WLS from &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; Predecessor-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ad2a8da74fd4e4c892018c56c977addee">getFullName</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; to &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; LoopExit-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ad2a8da74fd4e4c892018c56c977addee">getFullName</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make sure no forward branching WLSs to the Predecessor become backwards</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// branching. An example loop structure where the Predecessor can&#39;t be moved,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// since bb2&#39;s WLS will become forwards once bb3 is moved before/above bb1.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// bb1:           - LoopExit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// bb2:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      WLS  bb3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// bb3:          - Predecessor</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      WLS bb1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
